column1: * 1902 - Voice actor Godfrey Kenton is born.
* 1970 - Tom Shippey receives a letter from J.R.R. Tolkien after giving a speech at a Tolkien-themed convention.
* 2000 - Another edition of Tolkien: The Illustrated Encyclopedia is published.
** Eorl and the Éothéod travel towards the Field of Celebrant.

** Gandalf examines Bilbo Bagginss Ring and determines from its inscription that it is the One Ring. He tells Frodo Baggins of the The One Ring#History and Frodo volunteers to leave the Shire in order to secure the Ring.
